fields.name: Ocean
fields.effect: Non-water monsters destroyed at end of turn.

fields.name: Cloning Factory
fields.effect: Add a copy of cards played to your hand.

fields.name: Fog of War
fields.effect: Monsters played here are hidden until attacked.

fields.name: Mana Spring
fields.effect: Gain 1 mana per turn if field is empty.

monsters.name: Chainsaw Imp
monsters.effect: Gains 200 ATK for each Spirit on your opponent's side of the field. This card can attack all Spirits your opponent controls once each.

monsters.name: Deep Sea Kraken
monsters.effect: On Summon: Move 1 enemy monster to this field.

monsters.name: Atlantean Warrior
monsters.effect: Immune to enemy spells while in Ocean field.

monsters.name: Elf Swordsman
monsters.effect: Gain 500 ATK while in Forest field.

monsters.name: Hydra
monsters.effect: Summon 2 Hydra Head tokens to adjacent locations (Fire/Dragon/0 cost/1000 atk/0 def).

spells.name: Element Blade
spells.effect: Change the equipped monster's attribute to one of your choice.

spells.name: Soul Reaper
spells.effect: Gain 500 ATK. When the equipped monster destroys a monster by battle, gain 1 Mana.

spells.name: Reroll
spells.effect: Discard your hand (min. 1 card), then draw 5 cards.
